Question.Subject: I just became a member of Demonoid and Im trying to get invitation codes?
Question.Content:
Demonoid doesnt tell you how how to get them, and i have some friends that really wanna get on Demonoid. What do i need to do?
whoever can help me out to get my invite codes i'll send you one.
Question.ChosenAnswer: You have to be a member at least 30 days. After that they are given out at random. Registration is open right now though.

Answer.Content: When you sign in at the top right click "Control Panel" and you will see the invitations just click "create a new invitation code" to see if you have any by the way registrations on demonoid are open right now they could just go quickly and sign up before the y close.
You have to be a member at least 30 days. After that they are given out at random. Registration is open right now though.
